column1: Appendix table 12. Number of sentenced prisoners in federal prison, by most serious offense,  2000, 2006, and 2007
Authors: Heather C. West and William J. Sabol, Ph.D.
Appendix table 12. Number of sentenced prisoners in federal prison, by most serious offense,  2000, 2006, and 2007
Note: All data are from the BJS Federal Justice Statistics Program. Data are for September 30 and based on all sentenced inmates, regardless of sentence length.
a/Includes murder and negligent and nonnegligent manslaughter.
